data.title: Legal: ALPINA Automobiles
data.text:
Thank you for visiting our website and for your interest in our products.

ALPINA Burkard Bovensiepen GmbH + Co. KG

entered in the Commercial Register of Kempten Local Court under HRA 5540, represented by the general partner:

ALPINA Service- und Verwaltungs-GmbH,

entered in the Commercial Register of Kempten Local Court under HRB 915, the latter being represented by the Managing Directors Andreas Bovensiepen, Florian Bovensiepen.

Alpenstraße 35-37

86807 Buchloe / Germany

Tel.:+49 8241 5005 - 0Fax:+49 8241 5005 - 155E-mail:info@remove-this.alpina.de VAT No.:DE 128 656 861 Excise ID:DE 000 00 523 003

TÜV SÜD Akademie GmbH

External Data Protection Officer ALPINA

Westendstraße 160

80339 München / Germany

ALPINA and the trademarks ALPINA, ALPINA SWITCH-TRONIC, ALPINA SHIFT-TRONIC are registered brands of ALPINA Burkard Bovensiepen GmbH + Co. KG

Copyright:

© Copyright ALPINA Burkard Bovensiepen GmbH + Co. KG, Buchloe, Germany

All rights reserved. The text, pictures, graphics, sound, videos, animation and any further information published here are subject to the copyright of ALPINA Burkard Bovensiepen GmbH + Co. KG. Reproduction or playback of the whole or any parts thereof is not permitted without written permission.

The ALPINA font and the ALPINA logo are protected brands of ALPINA Burkard Bovensiepen GmbH + Co. KG

The vehicles illustrated show the equipment for the Federal Republic of Germany. They include for example special equipment, which is not fitted as standard and is available at additional cost. In certain countries not all models are available due to country-specific regulations and conditions. Please inform yourself about the available models and exact range of equipment at your ALPINA dealer or through the ALPINA importer of your country.

Please use only original ALPINA parts for your vehicle. These parts can be obtained through your registered ALPINA and BMW dealers. The respective ALPINA dealer is familiar with the tested accessory parts and will be happy to advise you.

Please observe further that if parts not passed for use by ALPINA are used, the guarantee of your vehicle can also be affected.

Inasmuch as this website directs to other websites run by third parties, ALPINA Burkard Bovensiepen GmbH + Co. KG can take no responsibility for the contents of these websites.

In case of any technical questions please consult: webmaster@remove-this.alpina.de
